column3: 5.13 Lay-out and install trusses according plans and specifications. 5.14 Install purlins according to wording drawing and details. 5.15 Lay-out and install fascia board according to job requirements. 5.16 Identify ceiling requirements such as manhole, electrical outlets, ventilations, etc. according to job requirements. 5.17 Install ceiling joist according to working drawings and specifications. 5.18 Demonstrate safe and effective operational use of tools and equipment. 5.19 Unexpected situations are responded accordingly
